TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ParameterDataType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the data type of a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the ParameterDataType enumeration with the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportParameterInfo.DataType%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportParameterInfo> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ParameterDataType Boolean = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A `Boolean` data type that represents a true or false condition.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ParameterDataType DateTime = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A `DateTime` data type that represents the date and time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ParameterDataType Float = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A `Float` data type that represents a floating point decimal value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ParameterDataType Integer = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ParameterDataType String = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A `String` data type that represents an array of characters.
